statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, country FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, country FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.age, f.feedback_text, f.feedback_date FROM CustomerDemographics c, CustomerFeedback f WHERE c.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback, customer_id FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 25);
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 50 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 2 OR customer_id = 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_id, score FROM customer_join WHERE score > 3 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, city, feedback_text, date_submitted FROM customer_insights WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 100 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, date_submitted FROM customer_feedback JOIN customer_demographics ON customer_feedback.customer_id = customer_demographics.customer_id WHERE age > 30 AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM customer_join WHERE score > 3);
SELECT * FROM customer_insights WHERE city = 'Chicago' AND score <= 5 ORDER BY age DESC, date_submitted ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, customer_city, customer_state FROM customers JOIN customer_location ON customers.customer_id = customer_location.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' AND customer_age > 25;

SELECT customers.customer_name, feedback.feedback_text, feedback_sentiment.sentiment_category FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id JOIN feedback_sentiment ON feedback.feedback_id = feedback_sentiment.feedback_id WHERE customers.customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, customer_city, customer_state FROM customers JOIN customer_location ON customers.customer_id = customer_location.customer_id WHERE customer_location = 'Home';

SELECT customers.customer_name, feedback.feedback_text, feedback_date, sentiment_score FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id JOIN feedback_sentiment ON feedback.feedback_id = feedback_sentiment.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
